SQL_STMT_U.val: select T1.DocDate,--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.DocNum, --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.CardCode, T1.CardName, --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) --TG.GroupName, T1.NumAtCard, --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.Comments as 'Remarks', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.U_IDU_Kode_PT as 'Consignee', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T3.PrcName as 'Consignee Name', Itemcode,Dscription,U_IDU_QtyPack,U_IDU_UOMPack,Quantity,UomCode,PriceBefDi as 'Price', T0.vatsum, ((Quantity*PriceBefDi)*T0.DiscPrcnt/100) as 'Disc barang', linetotal as 'SubTotal', T1.DpmAmnt as 'DP Dokumen', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.DiscSum as 'Disc Dokumen', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.WTSum as 'PPh',--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.RoundDif as 'Rounding', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.DocTotal as 'Total Invoice',--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.PaidToDate as 'Total Paid',--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.DocTotal - T1.PaidToDate as 'BalanceDue',--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht), T1.DocStatus as 'Status',--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht), T2.DESCRIPTION as 'Base Document', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T0.BaseRef as 'Base Number', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.CANCELED from INV1 T0 join OINV T1 on T0.DocEntry=T1.DocEntry join SYS_GCM T2 on T1.ObjType=T2.GCM_ID and T2.CONDITION='HTTP-REQ' JOIN OPRC T3 on T1.U_IDU_Kode_PT = T3.PrcCode --JOIN OCRD T4 on T1.CardCode = T4.CardCode --JOIN OCRG TG on T4.GroupCode = TG.GroupCode WHere T1.DocDate Between ':1' AND ':2' AND (T1.CardCode = ':3' or ':3'='' or ':3' is null) AND ISNULL(T1.NumAtCard,'') Like '%:4%' AND ISNULL(T1.DocNum,'') LIKE '%:5%' AND (T1.U_IDU_Kode_PT = ':6' or ':6'='' or ':6' is null) ORDER BY T1.CardCode,T1.CardName,T1.DocNum --dibuatkan subtotal berdasarkan customer code/customer name dan total keseluruhan (ex: report grn to payment)

ExpSyntax.val: DStr({0,90},'DD MMMMMMMMMM YYYY')&' to '&DStr({0,91},'DD MMMMMMMMMM YYYY')

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT COUNT(0) as 'Span' From (select T1.DocDate,--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.DocNum, --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.CardName, --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) --TG.GroupName, T1.NumAtCard, --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.Comments as 'Remarks', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.U_IDU_Kode_PT as 'Consignee', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T3.PrcName as 'Consignee Name', Itemcode,Dscription,U_IDU_QtyPack,U_IDU_UOMPack,Quantity,UomCode,PriceBefDi as 'Price', T0.vatsum, ((Quantity*PriceBefDi)*T0.DiscPrcnt/100) as 'Disc barang', linetotal as 'SubTotal', T1.DpmAmnt as 'DP Dokumen', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.DiscSum as 'Disc Dokumen', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.WTSum as 'PPh',--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.RoundDif as 'Rounding', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.DocTotal as 'Total Invoice',--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.PaidToDate as 'Total Paid',--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.DocTotal - T1.PaidToDate as 'BalanceDue',--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht), T1.DocStatus as 'Status',--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht), T2.DESCRIPTION as 'Base Document', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T0.BaseRef as 'Base Number', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.CANCELED from INV1 T0 join OINV T1 on T0.DocEntry=T1.DocEntry join SYS_GCM T2 on T1.ObjType=T2.GCM_ID and T2.CONDITION='HTTP-REQ' JOIN OPRC T3 on T1.U_IDU_Kode_PT = T3.PrcCode --JOIN OCRD T4 on T1.CardCode = T4.CardCode --JOIN OCRG TG on T4.GroupCode = TG.GroupCode Where T1.DocNum = :1 AND T1.CardCode = ':2')x

select T1.DocDate,--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.DocNum, --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.CardName, --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) --TG.GroupName, T1.NumAtCard, --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.Comments as 'Remarks', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.U_IDU_Kode_PT as 'Consignee', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T3.PrcName as 'Consignee Name', Itemcode,Dscription,U_IDU_QtyPack,U_IDU_UOMPack,Quantity,UomCode,PriceBefDi as 'Price', T0.vatsum, ((Quantity*PriceBefDi)*T0.DiscPrcnt/100) as 'Disc barang', linetotal as 'SubTotal', T1.DpmAmnt as 'DP Dokumen', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.DiscSum as 'Disc Dokumen', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.WTSum as 'PPh',--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.RoundDif as 'Rounding', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.DocTotal as 'Total Invoice',--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.PaidToDate as 'Total Paid',--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.DocTotal - T1.PaidToDate as 'BalanceDue',--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht), T1.DocStatus as 'Status',--field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht), T2.DESCRIPTION as 'Base Document', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T0.BaseRef as 'Base Number', --field ini di merger berdasarkan Docnum (Mht) T1.CANCELED from INV1 T0 join OINV T1 on T0.DocEntry=T1.DocEntry join SYS_GCM T2 on T1.ObjType=T2.GCM_ID and T2.CONDITION='HTTP-REQ' JOIN OPRC T3 on T1.U_IDU_Kode_PT = T3.PrcCode --JOIN OCRD T4 on T1.CardCode = T4.CardCode --JOIN OCRG TG on T4.GroupCode = TG.GroupCode WHere T1.DocDate Between ':1' AND ':2' AND (T1.CardCode = ':3' or ':3'='' or ':3' is null) AND ISNULL(T1.NumAtCard,'') Like '%:4%' AND ISNULL(T1.DocNum,'') LIKE '%:5%' AND (T1.U_IDU_Kode_PT = ':6' or ':6'='' or ':6' is null) ORDER BY T1.CardCode,T1.CardName,T1.DocNum --dibuatkan subtotal berdasarkan customer code/customer name dan total keseluruhan (ex: report grn to payment)
